answers.answer: I'm confused on your  diabetes, is that what you are averaging fasting, or before and after meals? That's not your A1c, is it gestational?

question: Hi im ftm.i had an ultrasound yesterday..my doc said that the baby is measuring 33weeks as i had to b 35weeks.im so much worried..plz any mothers there do share ur experiences.im having low lying placenta and also have 218 level of diabetes.im too much worried.
title: less baby growth..plz reply..im worried :-(
